In England, in the seven days to 04 May, there were 12,055 new confirmed cases (21.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 27 April, there were 13,271 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 9% (1,216 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 09 May is 3,874,415 (6,883.3 cases per 100,000 population).
